SEARCH
Package DB

Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
DB.AbstractDAO<Client>
DB.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO<Client>
ClientDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Client entities. It extends the generic AbstractDAO class and provides CRUD operations for Client objects.
